title:
Error analysis of an L2-type method on graded meshes for semilinear
  subdiffusion equations
abstract:
A semilinear initial-boundary value problem with a Caputo time derivative of
fractional order $\alpha\in(0,1)$ is considered, solutions of which typically
exhibit a singular behaviour at an initial time. For an L2-type discretization
of order $3-\alpha$, we give sharp pointwise-in-time error bounds on graded
temporal meshes with arbitrary degree of grading.
